description:
Team Caduceon in Ottawa is looking for a reliable and friendly individual to help us out with Sample Reception, Shipping and Receiving and Sample Pickup. The successful candidate will work in our Sample Reception Department with a small team of individuals.
Position: Customer Service/Sample Reception – Full-time
Location: 2378 Holly Lane, Ottawa, ON. K1V 7P1
Requirements: Valid Driver’s license required, good attitude, punctual and ability to pick up/move up to 50lbs boxes/crates/coolers. Telephone Skills, Experience with MS Access or similar Database and Bilingual (i.e. English & French) will be considered and asset.
Duties will entail the following:
· Receiving of Environmental Samples either by Direct Client Drop off or via Courier.
· Ensure all samples are received in good condition and meet appropriate QA/QC Requirements
· Log samples into the Laboratory Information System (LIMS)
· Label samples with unique ID’s generated from the LIMS.
· Transfer samples to the appropriate storage areas of the Laboratory.
· Preparation of bottle orders and supplies to be shipped or picked-up for customers.
· Shipping/handling of bottle orders and supplies
· Back-up receptionist when primary Receptionist is on break or holiday.
· As you gain experience with the day to day operations of the Lab, provide consultation, recommendations, and technical assistance to clients.
· Stay current on the application and interpretation of environmental regulations
· Document and get closure on all client complaints
· Preparation and shipping of subcontracted analyses
· Coordinate and schedule on time pick-up of samples – including dropping off/picking up of samples
· Coordinate on time and accurate delivery of all bottle orders
· Adhere to all Health and Safety Regulations
· Ensure Quality Standards are maintained
· Provide client feedback to the management
· Adhere to and participate with all QA\QC policies of the organization
OTHER RELATED DUTIES AS REQUIRED
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: From $18.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Extended health care

Schedule:

 8 hour shift

Supplemental pay types:

 Overtime pay

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Ottawa, ON: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Application question(s):

 Must be eligible to work in Canada

Work Location: In person
